1- Unpack
2- Install the update
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!


v1.09:

- Fixed some corrupted texts and character names

- Fixed two critical bugs (Act 1 and Act 4) which made it impossible to finish a mission in some rare cases. Existing savegames will still load but the affected mission needs to be restarted in order for the changes to take effect

- Added three new Hotseat mode maps (also playable versus AI) in
which the player can now also take control of the Undead Hordes
